org.xflatdb.xflat

Class ShardsetConfig<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xflatdb.xflat.ShardsetConfig<T>

  • public class ShardsetConfig<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the configuration for a sharded table. A sharded table is one which splits its data up among several files.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      • create

        public static <U> ShardsetConfig<U> create(java.lang.String xpathProperty,
                           java.lang.Class<U> propertyClass,
                           IntervalProvider<U> intervalProvider)
        Creates a ShardsetConfig with the minimum configuration necessary for static-range sharding. The remainder can be left default or set as desired.
        Type Parameters:
        U -
        Parameters:
        xpathProperty - An XPath expression selecting a property of the data to shard on.
        propertyClass - The class of the property selected by the xpath expression.
        intervalProvider - A RangeProvider that determines the static ranges for the property, each range will have its own file.
        Returns:
        A new shardset config.

      • create

        public static <U> ShardsetConfig<U> create(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<?> xpathProperty,
                           java.lang.Class<U> propertyClass,
                           IntervalProvider<U> rangeProvider)
        Creates a ShardsetConfig with the minimum configuration necessary for static-range sharding. The remainder can be left default or set as desired.
        Type Parameters:
        U -
        Parameters:
        xpathProperty - An XPath expression selecting a property of the data to shard on.
        propertyClass - The class of the property selected by the xpath expression.
        rangeProvider - A RangeProvider that determines the static ranges for the property, each range will have its own file.
        Returns:
        A new shardset config.
